titleStmt.title: Scotlands thanks-giving for the returne of their armie. Together vvith a true copie of a letter from Dublin of their last proceedings, sent to Iohn Bibie drum-major for the Tower and Citie of London.
titleStmt.author: Bacon, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in the same yeare, the Scots armie did retire. Printed for T. Paine and M. Simmons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the same yeare, the Scots armie did retire. Printed
